item.title: Software Carpentry Scientific Python Course Part 1
item.description:
Description

Tutorial materials found here: https://scipy2017.scipy.org/ehome/220975/493423/

Software Carpentry (SWC) is a volunteer non-profit organization dedicated to teaching basic computing skills to researchers. SWC lessons cover such topics as Linux shell, Python, Git, SQL, and R. In this hands-on workshop you will be introduced to the main concepts of programming in Python.
item.dc:creator: Maxim Belkin
